ingredients.ingredient: 4 each Mission® Sundried Tomato Basil Wraps

cookingTips: Spread sauce and cheese evenly, leaving a border so filling doesn't escape when folded
Cook over medium-high heat until the wrap is crispy and cheese is melted
Cut diagonally after cooking for easier handling and appealing presentation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These quick wraps are great for weeknight dinners. How will you fill and cook them to get crispy exteriors and melted cheese without burning?
